name: Charlotte Stone
title: Software Developer, Translator
aboutText1: Iâ€™m Charlotte, a passionate full-stack web developer based in the Greater Swansea Area. With over five years of experience in technical support and software engineering, I specialize in creating dynamic websites using JavaScript, Python, React, Node, Django, and more. My approach is human-centered, focused on delivering tangible value and ensuring seamless user experiences.
aboutText2: I possess a robust background in translation, having engaged in diverse projects spanning technology and education sectors. While English is my native language, I am proficient in Japanese and French while also conversant in various other languages. I am continuously seeking new opportunities to assist businesses in reaching a global audience.

1.title: Desktop Pomodoro Timer and Checklist
1.description: The Pomodoro Timer and Checklist Application is a desktop productivity tool built using Electron, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. It combines a Pomodoro timer for time management with a checklist feature for task organization.
